description:
11.204 readeia608
Read closed captioning (EIA-608) information from the top lines of a video frame.

This filter adds frame metadata for lavfi.readeia608.X.cc and
lavfi.readeia608.X.line, where X is the number of the identified line
with EIA-608 data (starting from 0). A description of each metadata value follows:


This filter accepts the following options:
name: readeia608

options.description: Set the line to start scanning for EIA-608 data. Default is 0.
options.name: scan_min

options.description: Set the line to end scanning for EIA-608 data. Default is 29.
options.name: scan_max

options.description: Set the ratio of width reserved for sync code detection. Default is 0.27. Allowed range is [0.1 - 0.7].
options.name: spw

options.description: Enable checking the parity bit. In the event of a parity error, the filter will output 0x00 for that character. Default is false.
options.name: chp

options.description: Lowpass lines prior to further processing. Default is enabled.
options.name: lp
